name: The Legend of The King
description: Track down the legendary pool player known only as 'The King' by following clues across the Mojave's ruined pool halls.
lore: Before the bombs fell, there was a pool player so skilled that people called him 'The King'. He vanished during the Great War, but legends say he left behind his prized cue and the secrets of his technique scattered across what remains of Vegas.

objectives.description: Visit Griff's Wasteland Cues and search for The King's first clue
The clue mentions 'Rack & Ruin' - investigate Cue D's old hall
Follow The King's tournament trail to Ballz Deep Billiards near the Strip
Visit Good Timez Tavern - The King's favorite late-night refuge
Search the New Vegas Cue Club where The King trained champions
Visit Backstage Bunker Bar where The King's cue was displayed
Journey to Putter's Ridge Hideaway - The King's final resting place

endings.description: You claim The King's legacy and become the new champion of the wasteland.
endings.consequence: Pool hall survivors across the Mojave recognize you as The King's heir.

endings.description: You leave the cue where it belongs, preserving The King's legend for future generations.
endings.consequence: The legend of The King continues to inspire wastelanders.

endings.description: You sell The King's cue to a pre-war artifact collector.
endings.consequence: The King's legacy fades into the irradiated dust.
